com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model

Class Attack

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Attack
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicAttack, FireAttack, FrostAttack

    public abstract class Attack
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class represents an Attack a that character generates and contains a damage score.
    Since:
    javac 1.8.0_271
    Author:
    Piedas, modified by Daniel Pereira Castillo Student number: 041009960 Lab Section 302
    See Also:
    FireAttack, FrostAttack, BasicAttack
